txt_en: You don't give up just because things are hard.
A great journey starts with a single step.
Life is full of surprises.
Nothing is set in stone.
Anything worth doing is worth doing right.
txt_cn: 值得做的事就要把它做好。

txt_en: Miracles happen every day.
Adulthood is responsibility.
Love conquers all.
Keep moving forward. Don't look back.
The full moon is at its brightest.
txt_cn: 又逢月圆，月色格外亮眼。

txt_en: We strive for excellence.
Things always happen when you least expect it.
txt_cn: 事情总是在最不经意间发生。

txt_en: Be grateful for fun times.
You gotta let go of that stuff from the past, cause it just doesn't matter.
txt_cn: 学会放手，让过去成为过去。

txt_en: Patience is a virtue.
Good things sometimes take time.
There are two sides to every story.
It's hard to like someone when you don't like yourself.
There are no shortcuts in life.
You can't just walk away from things.
Suffering builds character.
As summer turns to fall, the forest enters a magical golden period.
txt_cn: 秋日到，森林一派金黄景象。

txt_en: Pride comes before the fall.
Some things in our lives are inevitable.
txt_cn: 生命中有些事是注定的。

txt_en: Music is the medicine of a troubled mind.
txt_cn: 音乐是治愈心灵的良药。

txt_en: All good things must come to an end.
We should all just be who we are.
Diligence is the mother of good luck.
Don't worry too much about what people think.
